Geege Schuman wrote:
> less obscure haiku 
> 
> buy a puppy, ro!
> they are chick magnets. master

Reminds me of a Gary Larson cartoon,
woman walking dog, man walking aligator,
dog mostly eaten by aligator, thought cloud
above man's head,
"This is *such* a great way to meet chicks!"

- Joe
